The easy, fast & fun way to learn how to sing: 30DaySinger.com

Drivin' along with my radio on feelin' good Ain't got no lady but maybe I'm thinkin' I could I slept all day nothing to do And I don't see the world goin' by And I don't even have to try I'm just hangin' around, oh yeah Thought I was cool When I dropped out of school it was great, yeah Could have gone crazy but I was too lazy to wait So I'm drivin' along, all alone And I don't see the world goin' by And I don't even have to try I'm just hangin' round I'm driving along all alone, yeah And I don't see the world goin' by And I don't even have to try No, I don't see the world going by And I don't even have to try I'm just hangin' around Ooh baby Listen to the people sing now Just hangin' round Just hangin' round Just hangin' round
